scenarios.name: Sarah creates her business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_sarah_coaching name = Sarah Chen Career Coaching slug = sarah-chen-coaching status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_sarah_main biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching name = Sarah Office slug = sarah-office timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create venue
scenarios.prompt: insert into venues id = ven_sarah_office biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching location_id = loc_sarah_main name = Coaching Office slug = coaching-office setup_minutes = 5 teardown_minutes = 5

scenarios.name: Create Sarah user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_sarah_setup_uc1 email = sarah.uc1.setup@example.com name = SarahChen status = active

scenarios.name: Create Sarah as resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_sarah biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching location_id = loc_sarah_main type = host host_user_id = usr_sarah_setup_uc1 name = Sarah Chen slug = sarah-chen timezone = America/Los_Angeles buffer_before_minutes = 10 buffer_after_minutes = 10 capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create service group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_groups id = sg_coaching biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching name = Coaching Services slug = coaching-services status = active

scenarios.name: Create 50-min career coaching service
scenarios.prompt: insert into services id = svc_career_coach biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching service_group_id = sg_coaching name = Career Coaching Session slug = career-coaching type = appointment visibility = public min_advance_booking_hours = 24 min_cancellation_notice_hours = 24 requires_approval = false allow_waitlist = false allow_overbooking = false status = active is_self_bookable = true

scenarios.name: Create service product
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_products id = sp_career_50min biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching name = 50-Minute Career Coaching slug = career-coaching-50min kind = booking duration_mode = fixed default_duration_minutes = 50 duration_step_minutes = 50 timezone = America/Los_Angeles base_price_amount = 15000 currency = USD is_published = true status = active

scenarios.name: Create offer
scenarios.prompt: insert into offers id = ofr_career_coaching biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching name = Career Coaching Session slug = career-coaching-session execution_mode = slot status = active is_published = true timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create offer version
scenarios.prompt: insert into offer_versions id = ov_career_v1 biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching offer_id = ofr_career_coaching version = 1 status = published duration_mode = fixed default_duration_min = 50 min_duration_min = 50 max_duration_min = 50 base_price_minor = 15000 currency = USD pricing_model = {} policy_model = {} capacity_model = {}

scenarios.name: Create Sarah's calendar
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendars id = cal_sarah biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching name = Sarah Calendar timezone = America/Los_Angeles slot_duration_min = 50 slot_interval_min = 50 pre_buffer_min = 10 post_buffer_min = 10 min_advance_booking_hours = 24 max_advance_booking_days = 60 status = active

scenarios.name: Create Monday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_monday biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching calendar_id = cal_sarah name = Monday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 1 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Tuesday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_tuesday biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching calendar_id = cal_sarah name = Tuesday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 2 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Wednesday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_wednesday biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching calendar_id = cal_sarah name = Wednesday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 3 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Thursday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_thursday biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching calendar_id = cal_sarah name = Thursday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 4 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create Friday availability
scenarios.prompt: insert into availability_rules id = ar_friday biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching calendar_id = cal_sarah name = Friday Hours mode = recurring frequency = weekly day_of_week = 5 start_time = 09:00:00 end_time = 17:00:00 action = available is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create calendar binding for resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into calendar_bindings id = cb_sarah biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching calendar_id = cal_sarah owner_type = resource resource_id = res_sarah owner_ref_key = "resource:res_sarah" is_primary = true is_active = true

scenarios.name: Create sellable
scenarios.prompt: insert into sellables id = sell_career_coaching biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching kind = service_product display_name = Career Coaching Session slug = career-coaching-session status = active currency = USD

scenarios.name: Link sellable to service product
scenarios.prompt: insert into sellable_service_products id = ssp_career biz_id = biz_sarah_coaching sellable_id = sell_career_coaching sellable_kind = service_product service_product_id = sp_career_50min

scenarios.name: Check Sarah's calendar is set up
scenarios.prompt: list calendars where id = cal_sarah

scenarios.name: Check availability rules
scenarios.prompt: list availability_rules where calendar_id = cal_sarah
